remarks: The scalar 1 embedded into an associative algebra corresponds to the 1 of the an associative algebra.  (Contributed by AV, 31-Jul-2019.)
statement:
ascl0.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
ascl0.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
assaascl0.a $e |- ( ph -> W e. AssAlg ) $.
assaascl1 $p |- ( ph -> ( A ` ( 1r ` F ) ) = ( 1r ` W ) ) $.
